item.title: Back After 4 Years: Scraping, Security, and New Projects
item.description:
After 4 Years of Silence

Yes, after nearly 4 years of neglecting this blog that I created whenever I found time to write, I’m finally stepping back onto this path. Let’s see what happens!

So, what happened during this time? I tried developing a bunch of projectsâ€”most of them turned out to be garbage, honestly. I built software for crypto, made some decent money, but ended up losing it all due to my own mistakes. Well, I guess it’s the price you pay for learning.
